Lemu user guide

User guide for Lemu app

Quick Start →

Write your BackstopJS tests easily

LEMU provides a GUI to configure your tests easily without the hassle of editing configuration file.

Run one, or all

LEMU allows you to run easily one test or all. Same thing for approval, you can approve precisely which screenshot is right.

And more coming

If you have any idea or you would like to see a new feature, go in the issues on LEMU's GitHub repository and submit your ideas.
